info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 12 at 4:39PM PDT until September 12 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SAN BERNARDINO AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 439 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain around Nipton Road. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Searchlight, Nipton, and Nipton And Ivanpah Roads. This includes State Route 164 in Clark County between mile marker 1 and mile marker 18. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
